If the schools want to join this movement - fine, but don't impose this law for the few transgendered against the many who are not - it's only a matter of time before this insane idea implodes. I think the teachers and administrators should be forced to let the few transgendered use the faculty lounge restrooms - this way the majority does not have to change for the few transgendered people. It's ridiculous that we are even having this discussion. Like I said they should use the restrooms in the teachers lounge - this would better protect the transgendered and the rest of the students wouldn't be subjected to this awkward new rule!
